name: Gladiator

description2: Your one-handed melee weapons now do +15% damage.
description3: Your one-handed melee weapons now do +20% damage.

description2: Weights of all chems (including Stimpacks) are reduced by 60%.
description3: Weights of all chems (including Stimpacks) are reduced by 90%.

name: Iron Fist

description2: Your punching attacks do +15% damage.
description3: Your punching attacks do +20% damage.

name: Slugger
description1: Your two-handed melee weapons now do +10% damage.
description2: Your two-handed melee weapons now do +15% damage.
description3: Your two-handed melee weapons now do +20% damage.

name: Pack Rat

description2: The weight of all junk items is reduced by 50%.
description3: The weight of all junk items is reduced by 75%.

name: Shotgunner
description1: Your shotguns now do +10% damage.
description2: Your shotguns now do +15% damage.
description3: Your shotguns now do +20% damage.

name: Basher
description1: Gun bashing does +25% damage with a 5% chance to cripple your opponent.
description2: Gun bashing does +50% damage with a 10% chance to cripple your opponent.

name: Sturdy Frame
description1: Armor weighs 25% less than normal.
description2: Armor weighs 50% less than normal.

name: Barbarian

description2: Every point of strength adds +3 damage resist (max 60). (No power armor)
description3: Every point of strength adds +4 damage resist (max 80). (No power armor)

name: Martial Artist
description1: Your melee weapons weigh 20% less and you can swing them 10% faster.
description2: Your melee weapons weigh 40% less and you can swing them 20% faster.
description3: Your melee weapons weigh 60% less and you can swing them 30% faster.

name: Scattershot

description2: Shotguns now weigh 60% less and you reload them 20% faster.
description3: Shotguns now weigh 90% less and you reload them 30% faster.

name: Expert Gladiator
description1: Your one-handed melee weapons now do +10% damage.
description2: Your one-handed melee weapons now do +15% damage.
description3: Your one-handed melee weapons now do +20% damage.

name: Blocker
description1: Take 15% less damage from your opponents' melee attacks.
description2: Take 30% less damage from your opponents' melee attacks.
description3: Take 45% less damage from your opponents' melee attacks.

name: Bandolier
description1: Ballistic weapon ammo weighs 45% less.

description1: Your shotguns now do +10% damage.
description2: Your shotguns now do +15% damage.

name: Strong Back

description2: Gain +20 to carry weight.
description3: Gain +30 to carry weight.

description1: Your non-explosive heavy guns now do +10% damage.

description3: Your non-explosive heavy guns now do +20% damage.

name: Ordnance Express
description1: Explosives Weigh 30% less.
description2: Explosives Weigh 60% less.
description3: Explosives Weigh 90% less.

description2: Gain 40 damage resistance while firing a heavy gun.

name: Expert Heavy Gunner
description1: Your non-explosive heavy guns now do +10% damage.

description3: Your non-explosive heavy guns now do +20% damage.

name: Pain Train
description1: Damage and stagger enemies by sprinting into them with Power Armor.
description2: Smash and stagger enemies by sprinting into them with Power Armor.
description3: Devastate and stagger enemies by sprinting into them with Power Armor.

description1: Your one-handed melee weapons now do +10% damage.

description1: Your non-explosive heavy guns now do +10% damage.

description3: Your non-explosive heavy guns now do +20% damage.

name: Concentrated Fire

description2: V.A.T.S. targets limbs. Focus fire to gain more accuracy and damage per shot.
description3: V.A.T.S. targets limbs. Focus fire to gain high accuracy and damage per shot.

name: Butcher's Bounty
description1: 40% chance to find extra meat from animal corpses.
description2: 60% chance to find extra meat from animal corpses.
description3: 80% chance to find extra meat from animal corpses.

name: Green Thumb
description1: Reap twice as much when harvesting flora.

name: Picklock
description1: Gain +1 lockpicking skill, and the lockpicking 'sweet spot' is 10% larger.

name: Bow Before Me
description1: Youw bows and crossbows ignore 12% armor and have a 3% chance to stagger.
description2: Youw bows and crossbows ignore 24% armor and have a 6% chance to stagger.
description3: Youw bows and crossbows ignore 36% armor and have a 9% chance to stagger.

description1: All pistols now have 10% more range and more accuracy when sighted.

description3: All pistols now have 30% more range and more accuracy when sighted.

description1: Your bows and crossbows do +10% damage.

description2: Your shotguns have even better accuracy and spread.

name: pannapictagraphist

name: Percepti-Bobble
description1: You hear directional audio when in range of a bobblehead.

description2: Automatic rifles now reload 20% faster and have better hip fire accuracy.

name: Expert Picklock
description1: Gain +1 lockpicking skill and the lockpicking 'sweet spot' is 10% larger.

description1: Your non-automatic rifles now to +10% damage.

name: Expert Archer
description1: Your bows and crossbows do +10% damage.
description2: Your bows and crossbows do +15% damage.
description3: Your bows and crossbows do +20% damage.

name: Fortune Finder
description1: You hear directional audio when in range of a caps stash.

name: Night Person
description1: Gain +1 INT and +1 PER between the hours of 6:00pm ands 6:00am.
description2: Gain +2 INT and +2 PER between the hours of 6:00pm ands 6:00am.
description3: Gain +3 INT and +3 PER between the hours of 6:00pm ands 6:00am.

name: Expert Commando
description1: Rigorous combat training means automatic rifles now do +10% damage.
description2: Rigorous combat training means automatic rifles now do +20% damage.
description3: Rigorous combat training means automatic rifles now do +30% damage.

name: Awareness
description1: You can view target's specific damage resistances in V.A.T.S..

description2: Gain improved control and hold your breath 50% longer while aiming through scopes.
description3: Gain improved control and hold your breath 75% longer while aiming through scopes.

description3: Deal +60% damage to glowing weapons.

name: Grenadier
description1: Your explosives detonate with a 50% larger radius.
description2: Your explosives detonate with twice the radius.

name: Long Shot
description1: Your rifles have 10% more range and more accuracy when sighted.
description2: Your rifles have 20% more range and even more accuracy when sighted.
description3: Your rifles have 30% more range and excellent accuracy when sighted.

name: Fire In The Hole
description1: See a throwing arc when tossing thrown weapons and they fly 15% further.
description2: See a throwing arc when tossing thrown weapons and they fly 30% further.
description3: See a throwing arc when tossing thrown weapons and they fly 50% further.

name: Master Picklock
description1: Gain +1 lockpicking skill and the lockpicking 'sweet spot' is 10% larger.

name: Master Rifleman
description1: Your non-automatic rifles now do +10% damage.
description2: Your non-automatic rifles now do +15% damage.

name: Master Archer
description1: Your bows and crossbows do +10% damage.
description2: Your bows and crossbows do +15% damage.
description3: Your bows and crossbows do +20% damage.

name: Master Commando
description1: Lifelong combat training means automatic rifles now do +10% damage.
description2: Lifelong combat training means automatic rifles now do +15% damage.
description3: Lifelong combat training means automatic rifles now do +20% damage.

name: Night Eyes
description1: Gain night vision while sneaking between 6:00pm and 6:00am.

name: Lead Belly
description1: You take 30% less radiation from eating and drinking.
description2: You take 60% less radiation from eating and drinking.
description3: You take no radiation from eating and drinking.

name: Dromedary
description1: All drinks quench thirst by an additional 25%.
description2: All drinks quench thirst by an additional 50%.
description3: All drinks quench thirst by an additional 75%.

name: Iron Stomach
description1: Your chance to catch a disease from food is reduced by 30%.
description2: Your chance to catch a disease from food is reduced by 60%.
description3: Your chance to catch a disease from food is reduced by 90%.

name: Slow Metabolizer
description1: All food satisfies hunger by an additional 25%.
description2: All food satisfies hunger by an additional 50%.
description3: All food satisfies hunger by an additional 75%.

name: Thirst Quencher
description1: Drinking any liquid has a 30% reduced chance to cause disease.
description2: Drinking any liquid has a 60% reduced chance to cause disease.
description3: Drinking any liquid has a 90% reduced chance to cause disease.

name: Good Doggy
description1: Eating dog food is now three times as benecifical.

name: Natural Resistance
description1: You are 30% less likely to catch a disease from the environment.
description2: You are 60% less likely to catch a disease from the environment.
description3: You are 90% less likely to catch a disease from the environment.

name: Hydro Fix
description1: Chems generate 50% less thirst.
description2: Chems no longer generate thirst.

name: Rejuvenated
description1: You gain increased benefit from being well fed or well hydrated.
description2: You gain much increased benefit from being well fed or well hydrated.

name: Cola Nut
description1: Nuka-Cola products are now twice as beneficial.
description2: Nuka-Cola products are now three times as beneficial.

name: Cannibal
description1: Eating human, ghoul, super mutant, scorched or mole miner corpses restores health and hunger.
description2: Eating human, ghoul, super mutant, scorched or mole miner corpses restores more health and hunger.
description3: Eating human, ghoul, super mutant, scorched or mole miner corpses restores much more health and hunger.

name: Vaccinated
description1: Chance of catching a disease from creatures is reduced by 30%.
description2: Chance of catching a disease from creatures is reduced by 60%.
description3: Chance of catching a disease from creatures is reduced by 90%.

name: Munchy Resistance
description1: Using chems induces 50% less hunger.
description2: Using chems now never induces hunger.

name: Homebody
description1: Gain gradual health regeneration while in your camp or workshop.
description2: Gain improved health regeneration while in your camp or workshop.

name: Adamantium Skeleton
description1: Your limb damage is now reduced by 30%.
description2: Your limb damage is now reduced by 60%.
description3: Your limb damage is now completely eliminated.

name: Solar Powered
description1: Gain +1 to STR and END between the hours of 6:00am and 6:00pm.
description2: Gain +2 to STR and END between the hours of 6:00am and 6:00pm.
description3: Gain +3 to STR and END between the hours of 6:00am and 6:00pm.

name: Chem Fiend
description1: Any chems you take last 30% longer.
description2: Any chems you take last 60% longer.
description3: Any chems you take last 100% longer.

name: Aquaboy/Aquagirl
description1: You no longer take rad damage from swimming and can breathe underwater.

name: Fireproof
description1: You take 15% less damage from explotions and flame attacks.
description2: You take 30% less damage from explotions and flame attacks.
description3: You take 45% less damage from explotions and flame attacks.

name: Ironclad
description1: Gain 10 damage and energy resistance while not wearing power armor.
description2: Gain 20 damage and energy resistance while not wearing power armor.
description3: Gain 30 damage and energy resistance while not wearing power armor.
description4: Gain 40 damage and energy resistance while not wearing power armor.
description5: Gain 50 damage and energy resistance while not wearing power armor.

name: Nocturnal Fortitude
description1: Gain +20 to max health between the hours of 6:00pm and 6:00am.
description2: Gain +40 to max health between the hours of 6:00pm and 6:00am.

name: Revenant
description1: Gain +25% damage bonus for 2 minutes when a player revives you.
description2: Gain +50% damage bonus for 2 minutes when a player revives you.

name: Rad Resistance
description1: Gain +10 radiation resistance.
description2: Gain +20 radiation resistance.
description3: Gain +30 radiation resistance.

name: Ghoulish
description1: Radiation now regenerates your lost health.
description2: Radiation now regenerates more of your lost health.
description3: Radiation now regenerates even more of your lost health!

name: Radicool
description1: The greater your rads, the greater your strength (max +5 STR)!.

name: Professional Drinker
description1: There's no chance you'll get addicted to alcohol.

name: All Night Long
description1: Hunger and thirst grow 20% more slowly at night.
description2: Hunger and thirst grow 40% more slowly at night.
description3: Hunger and thirst grow 60% more slowly at night.

name: Chem Resistant
description1: You're half as likely to get addicted when consuming chems.
description2: You gain complete immunity to chem addiction.

name: Sun Kissed
description1: Slowly regen radiation between the hours of 6:00am and 6:00pm.
description2: Quickly regen radiation between the hours of 6:00am and 6:00pm.

name: Photosynthetic
description1: Gain health regen between the hours of 6:00am and 6:00pm.
description2: Gain improved health regen between the hours of 6:00am and 6:00pm.

name: Lifegiver
description1: Gain a total of +15 to your maximum health.
description2: Gain a total of +30 to your maximum health.
description3: Gain a total of +45 to your maximum health.

name: Inspirational
description1: When you are on a team, gain 5% more XP.
description2: When you are on a team, gain 10% more XP.
description3: When you are on a team, gain 15% more XP.

name: Happy Camper
description1: Hunger and thirst grow 40% more slowly when in a camp or workshop.
description2: Hunger and thirst grow 80% more slowly when in a camp or workshop.

name: Lone Wanderer
description1: When adventuring alone, take 10% less damage and gain 10% AP regen.
description2: When adventuring alone, take 15% less damage and gain 20% AP regen.
description3: When adventuring alone, take 20% less damage and gain 30% AP regen.

name: Bodyguards
description1: Gain 6 damage and energy resist (max 18) for each teammate excluding you.
description2: Gain 8 damage and energy resist (max 24) for each teammate excluding you.
description3: Gain 10 damage and energy resist (max 30) for each teammate excluding you.
description4: Gain 12 damage and energy resist (max 36) for each teammate excluding you.

name: Hard Bargain
description1: Buying and selling prices at vendors are better.
description2: Buying and selling prices at vendors are even better.
description3: Buying and selling prices at vendors are now much better.

name: E.M.T.
description1: Players you revive come back with health regen for 15 seconds.
description2: Players you revive come back with improved health regen for 30 seconds.
description3: Players you revive come back with high health regen for 60 seconds.

name: Bloodsucker
description1: Bloodpacks now satisfy thirst, no longer irradiate and heal 50% more.
description2: Bloodpacks satisfy more thirst, no longer irradiate and heal 100% more.
description3: Bloodpacks greatly satisfy thirst, no longer irradiate and heal 150% more.

name: Magnetic Personality
description1: Gain 1 charisma for each teammate excluding yourself.
description2: Gain 2 charisma for each teammate excluding yourself.

name: Field Surgeon
description1: Stimpacks and Radaway now work much more quickly.

name: Happy-Go-Lucky
description1: Your luck is increased by 2 while under the influence of alcohol.
description2: Your luck is increased by 3 while under the influence of alcohol.

name: Injector
description1: Players you revive have +6 AP regen for 10 minutes.
description2: Players you revive have +12 AP regen for 10 minutes.
description3: Players you revive have +18 AP regen for 10 minutes.

name: Team Medic
description1: Your Stimpacks now also heal your teammates for half the normal strength.
description2: Your Stimpacks now also heal your teammates for 75% the normal strength.
description3: Your Stimpacks now also heal your teammates to their full strength.

name: Quack Surgeon
description1: Revive other players with liquor!

name: Party Boy/Girl
description1: The positive effects of pre-war alcohol are doubled.
description2: The positive effects of pre-war alcohol are tripled.

name: Travel Agent
description1: You pay 30% fewer caps when fast traveling.

name: Healing Hands
description1: Players you revive are cured of all rads.

name: Animal Friend
description1: Aim your gun at any animal below your level for a 25% chance to pacify it.
description2: Aim your gun at any animal below your level for a 50% chance to pacify it.
description3: Aim your gun at any animal below your level for a 75% chance to pacify it.

name: Overly Generous
description1: Rads increase your chance to inflict 25 rads with melee attacks!
description2: Rads increase your chance to inflict 50 rads with melee attacks!

name: Anti-Epidemic
description1: Your disease cures have a 50% chance to cure a disease on nearby teammates.
description2: Your disease cures always cure a disease on nearby teammates.

name: Spiritual Healer
description1: You regenerate health for 5 seconds after reviving another player.
description2: You regenerate more health for 7 seconds after reviving another player.
description3: You regenerate even more health for 10 seconds after reviving another player.

name: Squad Manuevers
description1: Run 10% faster when part of a team.
description2: Run 20% faster when part of a team.

name: Philanthropist
description1: Restore some of your teammates hunger and thirst when you eat or drink.
description2: Restore more of your teammates hunger and thirst when you eat or drink.
description3: Restore much more of your teammates hunger and thirst when you eat or drink.

name: Suppressor
description1: Reduce your target's damage output by 10% for 2 seconds after you attack.
description2: Reduce your target's damage output by 20% for 2 seconds after you attack.
description3: Reduce your target's damage output by 30% for 2 seconds after you attack.

name: Strange In Numbers
description1: Positive mutation effects are 25% stronger if your teammates are mutated too.

name: Rad Sponge
description1: When affected by rads, you periodically heal 80 rads on nearby teammates.
When affected by rads, you periodically heal 140 rads on nearby teammates.
When affected by rads, you periodically heal 200 rads on nearby teammates.

name: Tenderizer
description1: Make your target receive 5% more damage for 5 seconds after you attack.
description2: Make your target receive 7% more damage for 7 seconds after you attack.
description3: Make your target receive 10% more damage for 10 seconds after you attack.

name: Friendly Fire
description1: Teammates hit by your flame weapons regen health briefly (no molotov).
description2: Teammates hit by your flame weapons regen more health briefly (no molotov).
description3: Teammates hit by your flame weapons regen even more health briefly (no molotov).

name: Wasteland Whisperer
description1: Aim your gun at a creature below your level for a 25% chance to pacify it.
description2: Aim your gun at a creature below your level for a 50% chance to pacify it.
description3: Aim your gun at a creature below your level for a 75% chance to pacify it.

name: First Aid
description1: Stimpaks restore 15% more lost health.
description2: Stimpaks restore 30% more lost health.
description3: Stimpaks restore 45% more lost health.

name: Hacker
description1: Gain +1 hacking skill and terminal lock-out time is reduced.

name: Licensed Plumber
description1: Your pipe weapons break 20% more slowly and are cheaper to repair.
description2: Your pipe weapons break 40% more slowly and are cheaper to repair.
description3: Your pipe weapons break 60% more slowly and are cheaper to repair.

name: Pharmacist
description1: Radaway removes 30% more radiation.
description2: Radaway removes 60% more radiation.
description3: Radaway removes twice as much radiation.

name: Makeshift Warrior
description1: Melee weapons break 10% slower and you can craft tier 1 melee weapons. (plans required)
description2: Melee weapons break 20% slower and you can craft tier 2 melee weapons. (plans required)
description3: Melee weapons break 30% slower and you can craft tier 3 melee weapons. (plans required)
description4: Melee weapons break 40% slower and you can craft tier 4 melee weapons. (plans required)
description5: Melee weapons break 50% slower and you can craft tier 5 melee weapons. (plans required)

name: Demolition Expert
description1: Your explosives do +20% more damage.
description2: Your explosives do +30% more damage.
description3: Your explosives do +40% more damage.

name: Gunsmith
description1: Guns break 10% slower and you can craft tier 1 guns. (plans required)
description2: Guns break 20% slower and you can craft tier 2 guns. (plans required)
description3: Guns break 30% slower and you can craft tier 3 guns. (plans required)
description4: Guns break 40% slower and you can craft tier 4 guns. (plans required)
description5: Guns break 50% slower and you can craft tier 5 guns. (plans required)

name: Scrapper
description1: Obtain more components when you scrap weapons and armor.

name: Armorer
description1: You can now craft advanced armor mods. (plans required)
description2: Crafting armor now costs fewer materials.
description3: Your crafted armor has improved durability.

name: Contractor
description1: Crafting workshop items now costs 25% fewer materials.
description2: Crafting workshop items now costs 50% fewer materials.

name: Science
description1: You can now craft energy guns. (plans required)
description2: You can now craft rank 1 energy gun mods. (plans required)

name: Expert Hacker
description1: Gain +1 hacking skill and terminal lock-out time is reduced.

name: Fix It Good
description1: You can repair armor and power armor to 130% of normal maximum condition.
description2: You can repair armor and power armor to 160% of normal maximum condition.
description3: You can repair armor and power armor to 200% of normal maximum condition.

name: Batteries Included
description1: Energy weapon ammo weighs 30% less.
description2: Energy weapon ammo weighs 60% less.
description3: Energy weapon ammo weighs 90% less.

name: Wrecking Ball
description1: You deal +40% damage to workshop objects.
description2: You deal +80% damage to workshop objects.
description3: You deal +120% damage to workshop objects.

name: Science Expert
description1: You can craft rank 2 energy gun mods. (plans required)
description2: Crafting energy guns now costs fewer materials.

name: Chemist
description1: You get double the quantity when you craft chems!

name: Stabilized
description1: In power armor, heavy guns gain more accuracy and ignore 15% armor.
description2: In power armor, heavy guns gain even more accuracy and ignore 30% armor.
description3: In power armor, heavy guns gain excellent accuracy and ignore 45% armor.

name: Master Hacker
description1: Gain +1 hacking skill and terminal lock-out time is reduced.

name: Weapon Artisan
description1: You can repair any weapon to 130% of normal maximum condition.
description2: You can repair any weapon to 160% of normal maximum condition.
description3: You can repair any weapon to 200% of normal maximum condition.

name: Power Smith
description1: You can now craft advanced power armor mods. (plans required)
description2: Crafting power armor now costs fewer materials.
description3: Your crafted power armor now has improved durability.

name: Science Master
description1: You can craft rank 3 energy gun mods. (plans required)
description2: Your crafted energy guns have improved durability.

name: Power Patcher
description1: Your power armor breaks 20% more slowly and is cheaper to repair.
description2: Your power armor breaks 40% more slowly and is cheaper to repair.
description3: Your power armor breaks 60% more slowly and is cheaper to repair.

name: Nerd Rage
description1: While below 20% health, gain 20 damage resist, 10% damage and 15% AP regen.
description2: While below 20% health, gain 30 damage resist, 15% damage and 15% AP regen.
description3: While below 20% health, gain 40 damage resist, 20% damage and 15% AP regen.

name: Robotics Expert
description1: Hack an enemy robot for a 25% chance to pacify it.
description2: Hack an enemy robot for a 50% chance to pacify it.
description3: Hack an enemy robot for a 75% chance to pacify it.

name: Portable Power
description1: All power armor parts and chassis weights are reduced by 25%.
description2: All power armor parts and chassis weights are reduced by 50%.
description3: All power armor parts and chassis weights are reduced by 75%.

name: Power User
description1: Fusion Cores now last 30% longer.
description2: Fusion Cores now last 60% longer.
description3: Fusion Core duration is now doubled.

name: Action Boy
description1: Action Points regenerate 15% faster.
description2: Action Points regenerate 30% faster.
description3: Action Points regenerate 45% faster.

name: Born Survivor
description1: Falling below 20% health will automatically use a stimpack, once every 20s.
description2: Falling below 30% health will automatically use a stimpack, once every 20s.
description3: Falling below 40% health will automatically use a stimpack, once every 20s.

name: Gun Runner
description1: Your running speed is increased by 10% when you have a pistol equipped.
description2: Your running speed is increased by 20% when you have a pistol equipped.

name: Moving Target
description1: Gain +15 damage and energy resistance while sprinting. (no power armor)
description2: Gain +30 damage and energy resistance while sprinting. (no power armor)
description3: Gain +45 damage and energy resistance while sprinting. (no power armor)

name: Gunslinger
description1: Your non-automatic pistols now do +10% damage.
description2: Your non-automatic pistols now do +15% damage.
description3: Your non-automatic pistols now do +20% damage.

name: Thru-Hiker
description1: Food and drink weights are reduced by 30%.
description2: Food and drink weights are reduced by 60%.
description3: Food and drink weights are reduced by 90%.

name: Dead Man Sprinting
description1: Sprint 10% faster at increased AP cost when your health is below 40%.
description2: Sprint 20% faster at increased AP cost when your health is below 50%.

name: Packin' Light
description1: Your pistols weight 25% less.
description2: Your pistols weight 50% less.
description3: Your pistols weight 75% less.

name: Guerilla
description1: Your automatic pistols now do +10% damage.
description2: Your automatic pistols now do +15% damage.
description3: Your automatic pistols now do +20% damage.

name: Marathoner
description1: Sprinting consumes 20% fewer Action Points. (no power armow)
description2: Sprinting consumes 30% fewer Action Points. (no power armow)
description3: Sprinting consumes 40% fewer Action Points. (no power armow)

name: Ninja
description1: Sneak attacks with melee weapons do 2.3x normal damager.
description2: Sneak attacks with melee weapons do 2.6x normal damager.
description3: Sneak attacks with melee weapons do 3x normal damager.

name: Evasive
description1: Each AGI point adds +1 damage and energy resist (max 15). (no power armor)
description2: Each AGI point adds +2 damage and energy resist (max 30). (no power armor)
description3: Each AGI point adds +3 damage and energy resist (max 45). (no power armor)

name: Modern Renegade
description1: Pistols gain +15% hip fire accuracy and a +4% chance to cripple a limb.
description2: Pistols gain +30% hip fire accuracy and a +8% chance to cripple a limb.
description3: Pistols gain +45% hip fire accuracy and a +12% chance to cripple a limb.

name: Sneak
description1: You are 25% harder to detect while sneaking.
description2: You are 50% harder to detect while sneaking.
description3: You are 75% harder to detect while sneaking.

name: Home Defense
description1: You can craft and disarm better traps and craft better turrets. (plans required)
description2: You can craft and disarm advanced traps and craft advanced turrets. (plans required)
description3: You can craft and disarm expert traps and craft experts turrets. (plans required)

name: Expert Gunslinger
description1: Your non-automatic pistols now do +10% damage.
description2: Your non-automatic pistols now do +15% damage.
description3: Your non-automatic pistols now do +20% damage.

name: Expert Guerilla
description1: Your automatic pistols now do +10% damage.
description2: Your automatic pistols now do +15% damage.
description3: Your automatic pistols now do +20% damage.

name: Covert Operative
description1: Your ranged sneak attacks deal 2.15x normal damage.
description2: Your ranged sneak attacks deal 2.3x normal damage.
description3: Your ranged sneak attacks deal 2.5x normal damage.

name: Enforcer
description1: Your shotguns gain a 5% stagger chance and a 10% chance to cripple a limb.
description2: Your shotguns gain a 10% stagger chance and a 20% chance to cripple a limb.
description3: Your shotguns gain a 15% stagger chance and a 30% chance to cripple a limb.

name: Goat Legs
description1: Take 40% less damage from falling.
description2: Take 80% less damage from falling.

name: Ammosmith
description1: Produce 40% more rounds when crafting ammunition.
description2: Produce 80% more rounds when crafting ammunition.

name: Escape Artist
description1: Sneak to lose enemies, and running no longer affects stealth.

name: Mister Sandman
description1: At night your silenced weapons do an additional 50% sneak attack damage.
description2: At night your silenced weapons do an additional 100% sneak attack damage.

name: Light Footed
description1: While sneaking, you never trigger mines or floor-based traps.

name: White Knight
description1: Your armor breaks 20% more slowly and is cheaper to repair.
description2: Your armor breaks 40% more slowly and is cheaper to repair.
description3: Your armor breaks 60% more slowly and is cheaper to repair.

name: Master Gunslinger
description1: Your non-automatic pistols now do +10% damage.
description2: Your non-automatic pistols now do +15% damage.
description3: Your non-automatic pistols now do +20% damage.

name: Master Guerilla
description1: Your automatic pistols now do +10% damage.
description2: Your automatic pistols now do +15% damage.
description3: Your automatic pistols now do +20% damage.

name: Dodgy
description1: Avoid 10% of incoming damage at the cost of 30 Action Points per hit.
description2: Avoid 20% of incoming damage at the cost of 30 Action Points per hit.
description3: Avoid 30% of incoming damage at the cost of 30 Action Points per hit.

name: Secret Agent
description1: Stealth Boys last twice as long.
description2: Stealth Boys last three times as long.
description3: Stealth Boys last four times as long.

name: Adrenaline
description1: Gain +6% (max 36%) damage for 30s perk kill. Duration refreshes with kills.
description2: Gain +7% (max 42%) damage for 30s perk kill. Duration refreshes with kills.
description3: Gain +8% (max 48%) damage for 30s perk kill. Duration refreshes with kills.
description4: Gain +9% (max 54%) damage for 30s perk kill. Duration refreshes with kills.
description5: Gain +10% (max 60%) damage for 30s perk kill. Duration refreshes with kills.

name: Gun Fu
description1: V.A.T.S. swaps target on kill with +10% damage to your next target.
description2: V.A.T.S. swaps target on kill with +10% then 20% damage to your next 2 targets.
description3: V.A.T.S. swaps target on kill with +10%, 20% then 30% damage to your next 3 targets.

name: Pharma Farma
description1: 40% chance to find extra first aid chems in chem containers.
description2: 60% chance to find extra first aid chems in chem containers.
description3: 80% chance to find extra first aid chems in chem containers.

name: Scrounger
description1: 40% chance to find extra ammo in ammo containers.
description2: 60% chance to find extra ammo in ammo containers.
description3: 80% chance to find extra ammo in ammo containers.

name: Serendipity
description1: While below 30% health, gain a 15% chance to avoid damage. (no power armor)
description2: While below 30% health, gain a 30% chance to avoid damage. (no power armor)
description3: While below 30% health, gain a 45% chance to avoid damage. (no power armor)

name: Can Do!
description1: 40% chance to find extra canned food in food containers.
description2: 60% chance to find extra canned food in food containers.
description3: 80% chance to find extra canned food in food containers.

name: Good With Salt
description1: Food in your inventory will spoil 30% more slowly.
description2: Food in your inventory will spoil 60% more slowly.
description3: Food in your inventory will spoil 90% more slowly.

name: Junk Shield
description1: Carry junk to gain up to 10 damage end energy resistance. (no power armor)
description2: Carry junk to gain up to 20 damage end energy resistance. (no power armor)
description3: Carry junk to gain up to 30 damage end energy resistance. (no power armor)

name: Mystery Meat
description1: Stimpaks may generate edible meat tissue. Higher rads improve the chance.
description2: Stimpaks may generate more edible meat tissue. Higher rads improve the chance.
description3: Stimpaks may generate excessive edible meat tissue. Higher rads improve the chance.

name: Luck Of The Draw
description1: Slight chance your weapon will repair itself when hitting an enemy.
description2: Chance your weapon will repair itself even more when hitting an enemy.
description3: Slight chance your weapon will greatly repair itself when hitting an enemy.

name: Cap Collector
description1: You find 33% more bottle caps in caps stashes.
description2: You find 66% more bottle caps in caps stashes.
description3: You find 100% more bottle caps in caps stashes.

name: Woodchucker
description1: Collect twice as much when harvesting wood.

name: Curator
description1: The benefits of bobbleheads and magazines last twice as long.

name: Psycopath
description1: Every kill in V.A.T.S. has a 5% chance to refill your critical meter.
description2: Every kill in V.A.T.S. has a 10% chance to refill your critical meter.
description3: Every kill in V.A.T.S. has a 15% chance to refill your critical meter.

name: Dry Nurse
description1: You have a 50% chance to keep your Stimpak when you revive another player.

name: Lucky Break
description1: Slight chance your equipped armor will repair itself when struck.
description2: Chance your equipped armor will repair itself even more when struck.
description3: Chance your equipped armor will greatly repair itself when struck.

name: Mysterious Stranger
description1: The mysterious stranger will appear occasionally in V.A.T.S. to lend a hand.
description2: The mysterious stranger appears more often when using V.A.T.S..
description3: The mysterious stranger appears so much in V.A.T.S. he knows you by name.

name: Last Laugh
description1: You drop a live grenade from your inventory when you die.

name: Four Leaf Clover
description1: Each hit in V.A.T.S. has a chance to fill your critical meter.
description2: Each hit in V.A.T.S. has a better chance to fill your critical meter.
description3: Each hit in V.A.T.S. has an excellent chance to fill your critical meter.

name: Starched Genes
description1: Less chance for you to mutate from rads or for radaway to cure mutations.
description2: You will never mutate from rads and radaway will never cure mutations.

name: One Gun Army
description1: Heavy guns gain a 4% stagger chance and a 4% chance to cripple a limb.
description2: Heavy guns gain a 8% stagger chance and a 8% chance to cripple a limb.
description3: Heavy guns gain a 12% stagger chance and a 12% chance to cripple a limb.

name: Grim Reaper's Sprint
description1: Any kill in V.A.T.S. has a 15% chance to restore all action points.
description2: Any kill in V.A.T.S. has a 25% chance to restore all action points.
description3: Any kill in V.A.T.S. has a 35% chance to restore all action points.

name: Storm Chaser
description1: Gain health regeneration while outside during rain or rad storms.
description2: Gain high health regeneration while outside during rain or rad storms.

name: Tormentor
description1: Your rifle attacks have a 5% chance of crippling a limb.
description2: Your rifle attacks have a 10% chance of crippling a limb.
description3: Your rifle attacks have a 15% chance of crippling a limb.

name: Ricochet
description1: Gain a 6% chance to deflect back some of enemies' ranged damage. (no PvP)
description2: Gain a 12% chance to deflect back some of enemies' ranged damage. (no PvP)
description3: Gain a 18% chance to deflect back some of enemies' ranged damage. (no PvP)

name: Quick Hands
description1: Gain a 6% chance to instantly reload when your clip is empty.
description2: Gain a 12% chance to instantly reload when your clip is empty.
description3: Gain a 18% chance to instantly reload when your clip is empty.

name: Bloody Mess
description1: 5% bonus damage means enemies may explode into a gory red paste.
description2: 10% bonus damage means enemies may explode into a gory red paste.
description3: 15% bonus damage means enemies may explode into a gory red paste.

name: Critical Savvy
description1: Critical hits now only consume 85% of your critical meter.
description2: Critical hits now only consume 70% of your critical meter.
description3: Critical hits now only consume 55% of your critical meter.

name: Class Freak
description1: The negative effects of your mutations are reduced by 25%.
description2: The negative effects of your mutations are reduced by 50%.
description3: The negative effects of your mutations are reduced by 75%.

name: Better Criticals
description1: V.A.T.S. criticals now do +50% damage.
description2: V.A.T.S. criticals now do +75% damage.
description3: V.A.T.S. criticals now do +100% damage.

name: Mysterious Savior
description1: A mysterious savior will occasionally appear to revive you when downed.
description2: A mysterious savior will more frequently appear to revive you when downed.
description3: A mysterious savior will regularly appear to revive you when downed.

name: Super Duper
description1: When you craft anything, there is a 10% chance you'll get double results!
description2: When you craft anything, there is a 20% chance you'll get double results!
description3: When you craft anything, there is a 30% chance you'll get double results!
